roleset.name: take control of something (often transportation) by force

example.name: political force
example.text: Republican leader Bill Frist said 0 [the Senate]-1 was hijacked *-1.

example.name: with agent
example.text: We can not le the fringes on both sides hijack the Supreme Court nominaiton process.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'hijack' based on sentences in ebc. Verbnet class force-59-1, other framed members include; annoy, bully, con, dupe, lure. seduce, wheedle.
